job_history.work_description: Maintains and expands customer base by counseling district sales representatives; building and maintaining rapport with key customers; identifying new customer opportunities. Recommends product lines by identifying new product opportunities, and/or product, packaging, and service changes; surveying consumer needs and trends; tracking competitors.
Daily bank deposit, weekly inventory, monthly meeting. Accomplishes sales and organization mission by completing related results as needed.

Accomplishes regional sales human resource objectives by recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees in assigned districts; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising, and reviewing job contributions; planning and reviewing compensation actions; enforcing policies and procedures.

skills.name: Sales
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in sales, including counseling district sales representatives, identifying new customer opportunities, and tracking competitors, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing teams, including recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, and disciplining employees, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience in building and maintaining rapport with key customers, identifying new customer opportunities, and surveying consumer needs and trends, showing strong proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing daily, weekly, and monthly tasks, including bank deposits, inventory, and meetings, indicating a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in communicating job expectations, planning, and reviewing job contributions, indicating a solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Human Resources
skills.explanation: Has experience in recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, and disciplining employees, indicating a solid working proficiency in human resources.
